rooms.description: Entry point with natural light and open space for social interaction.
Spacious living area aligned with Vastu principles ensuring energy flow.
Cozy dining space adjoining the living room for family meals.
Eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and natural ventilation.
Primary bedroom with a private balcony for relaxation and fresh air.
Secondary bedroom with a private balcony aligned to favorable Vastu directions.

openings.description: Primary entrance door facing east for optimal energy flow according to Vastu.
Large windows ensuring natural light and cross ventilation in living room.
Balcony opening leading to a private outdoor space for bedroom_1.
Balcony opening for bedroom_2 ensuring privacy and light.

garden.description: Large garden space integrated with eco-friendly landscaping and a private gym area

rooms.description: Spacious balcony extension to bedroom_1, providing extra outdoor space.
Balcony extension to bedroom_2 for additional ventilation and garden view.

openings.description: Direct access from bedroom_1 to its balcony extension.
Direct access from bedroom_2 to its balcony extension.
